full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/8/2023 19. If in the U.S. is your spouse included in your request for asyium? Yes No (If not. explain why) 20. If in the U.S. is spouse making separate application for saylum? Yes No (If not. explain why) BECAUSE SHE IS LIVING WITH ME AND WE ARE APPLYING NOW. 21. If in the U.S. are children included in your request for asylum? Yes No (If not. explain why) BECAUSE THEY ARE ADULTS 22. I have sons or daughters as follows: (Complete all columns as to each son or daughter If living with you state "with me" in last column: otherwise give city and state or foreign country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of birth Date of birth Now living at MARIA EVANGELINA HERNANDEZ F NICARAGUA 09-20-1943 NEW JERSEY, N.J. MARCO HERNANDEZ M NICARAGUA 03-08-1946 PANAMA RODOLFO HERNANDEZ M NICARAGUA 05-14-1948 WITH ME FOIA (b)(6) 23. Kelatives in U.S. other than immediate ramuy Name Address Relationship Immigration status NONE 24. Other relatives who are refugees but outside the U.S. Name Relationship Country where presently located NONE 25. List all travel or identity documents such as national passport. refugee convention travel document or national identity card Document type Issuing country or Date of Date of Document number authority issue Cost Obtained by whom expiration PASSPORT C-082950 NICARAGUA 10-11-1982 10-08-1988 20.00 MYSELF PASSPORT C-082878 NICARAGUA 10-11-1982 10-08-1988 20.00 MYSELF 26. Why did you obtain U.S. visa? WE SOLICITED VISA LIKE TOURIST BUT IN GUATEMALA WE HAD HARD PRESSURE BECAUSE WE ARE ALIENS AND DECIDED TO REQUEST FOR ASYLUM IN U.S.A. WHERE ARE LIVING OUR SONS & DAUGHTERS BECAUSE WE CAN'T RETURN TO NICARAGUA. 27. If you did not apply for a U.S. visa. explain why not? N/A 28 Date of departure from your country of nationality 29. Was exit permission required to leave your country XXYes No (If so. did you obtain exit permission (Mo/Day Yr.) Yes No If not. explain why) 10-08-84
